title: Low priority queue alternative
body:
I realise that this has probably been said before... but the low priority queue system is insane.  I'm offering an alternative here.  I have had legitimate reasons for having to AFK in games.  Most recently it's been in a 5s team with my friends who all understand my situation.  Finally this has resulted in 20 minute queues... and now I've been waiting for 2.5 hrs to get into a single game. 

Here is my proposition.  As an option against waiting for 5, 10, 20 minutes for each game... offer an alternative - pay $5 or $10 to clear your low priority status (or a certain amount of RP relative to the aforementioned prices).  You will then be cleared of AFK history and then start back at 5 minutes.  Doing this would allow for people to have their legitimate reasons but (like me) want to be able to play with their friends and no longer can.  This would also offer an additional revenue stream for Riot and meanwhile allowing people who would be willing to pay to justify their legitimate reason for having to AFK.

I will not go into details, but if Riot wants to query my reason they can certainly contact me in many ways.

Please consider my proposition.

replies.body:
> pay $5 or $10 to clear your low priority status

So basically, turn it into a system just as corruptible as the legal system? How about no.

> Doing this would allow for people to have their legitimate reasons but (like me) want to be able to play with their friends and no longer can.

Only if they have money to spend on the game... And it would also work for the intentional AFKers/DCers...

I seriously can't believe you honestly think this idea is not outright idiotic...

> Please consider my proposition.

It's ***never*** going to be considered so just drop it.

So what do you propose would be an adequate alternative for people with legitimate reasons?  I have now been in queue for over 2.5 hours without being able to get into a game.  Do you really think that's justifiable under Riot's current system?

As I said, I will not disclose my reasoning for having to AFK on a public channel... but what I am considering is the opportunity to still play with my friends.

Also I notice you didn't touch on the fact that I was placed in low priority after playing with ONLY my friends/team.  You seem to just have pulled sections of my post that (out of context) support your views.

> Do you really think that's justifiable under Riot's current system?

Yep. Why should dozens (if not hundreds) of other players suffer because you have the misfortune of real life getting in the way way too often?
The assumption being that the only people playing games with you are your friends/teams...

My confusion is that you say you are only playing with your friends, but you are playing normals? Does that not mean you are playing with 5 other people who AREN'T your friends? Their game is ruined as well by you disconnecting. If you're playing in 5v5 custom then you don't get low priority queues. HeartVine is being pretty antagonistic about it but Riot has said time and time again, even if your reason is legitimate, you are still ruining the game for 9 other people, assuming your argument, still 5 other people. If it's something that is happening consistently enough to get you low priority queues then it's something you either need to fix, or simply allow for the low priority queues, because it means you're ruining a lot of games. Once a week and leaver buster wouldn't pick you up for it. Multiple times a day and you can expect it.

It's your responsibility to make sure you have at least 1 hour of free time, when you queue up for a game. Sometimes disconnects do happen by accident, but leaver buster is designed to allow for some disconnects occasionally.

You could play a custom game.

1) If you dc it won't matter because its not an official game and since your "friends understand the situation".

2) You can sill gain IP. as long as you:
- Make sure the game goes over 7 minutes.
- At the start of the game over half of the players are human.
- The game has an even amount of champions(which can include bots)

3) This won't work off your bans but you won't have to wait 10/20/30 minutes before entering a game.

4) If you go tournament draft it is possible to pause the game.
